duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide diagnostic and medical nurse practitioner services to patients with IDD.
Perform medical assessments and build treatment plans for patients.
Participate in interdisciplinary Clinical Protocol meetings and consultation with medical providers.
Assist Medical Director with hiring of medical team staff.
Assist Medical Director with evaluations of medical team staff.
Serve as a mentor and supervising instructor for all medical students, APRN students, residents and fellows.

education_certification.credential: 2 years’ experience APRN, Experience with medical EMR, Experience with patients with IDD
